sections.Description (verbatim): This is a small chamber, which appears to have been part of a coal mine. On the south wall of the chamber the letters "GRANITE WALL" are etched in the rock. To the east is a long passage, and there is a steep metal slide twisting downward. To the north is a small opening.
Hidden/conditional transitions: One-way traversal: one can only go down the slide, not up it.
